actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the time for making an election under subchapter S of such code with respect to a small business corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the time for a small business corporation to elect subchapter S status from the first month to the fifteenth day of the third month of the taxable year, and to any time during the preceding taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the time for making an election under subchapter S of such code with respect to a small business corporation.
